Comment: No. The Democratic party needs to push impeachment among other measures nonstop. If they wait until Trump lacks the popularity to continue it's going to be far harder. The fact that the Democratic party had the ability to do something and sat on their asses instead is why Trump even had the possibility of running in 2024, not to mention winning. The Democratic party should have played hardball instead of waiting for that "perfect opportunity"... that never came.   The wise do not wait for opportunities, they make them.
